FuncDef: This command specifies whether fast reroute for LSPs using thefacilitybypass method is signaled with or without the fast reroute object using theone-to-onekeyword. The value is ignored if fast reroute is disabled for the LSP or if the LSP is using one-to-one Backup.
ExtraInfo: Default: frr-object - Specifies the value is by default inherited by all LSPs.
